content:
this is a single endpoint from an open api spec document
it has been minified by removing unnecessary kvps
additionally common terms have been abbreviated  operationId: GetLogs path: https://gateway.stackpath.com/workload/v1/stacks/{stack_id}/workloads/{workload_id}/instances/{instance_name}/logs content: params
name stackid
desc a stack id or slug
in path
required true
schema
type str
name workloadid
desc an edgecompute workload id
in path
required true
schema
type str
name instancename
desc an edgecompute workload instance name
in path
required true
schema
type str
name containername
desc the name of the container to obtain logs for this defaults to first container in the instance
in query
required false
schema
type str
name follow
desc whether or not to follow the instances log stream this defaults to false
in query
required false
schema
type bool
format bool
name previous
desc whether or not to return log entries made by previously terminated containers this defaults to false
in query
required false
schema
type bool
format bool
name sinceseconds
desc a relative time in seconds before the current time from which to show logs if this value precedes the time an instance was started only logs since the instances start time will be returned if this value is in the future no logs will be returned

only one of sinceseconds or sincetime may be specified
in query
required false
schema
type str
name sincetime
desc an rfc3339 timestamp from which to show logs if this value precedes the time an instance was started only logs since the instances start time will be returned if this value is in the future no logs will be returned

only one of sinceseconds or sincetime may be specified
in query
required false
schema
type str
format datetime
name timestamps
desc whether or not to add an rfc3339 or rfc3339nano timestamp at the beginning of every line of log output this defaults to false
in query
required false
schema
type bool
format bool
name taillines
desc the number of lines from the end of the logs to show if not specified logs are shown from the creation of the container or sinceseconds or sincetime
in query
required false
schema
type str
name limitbytes
desc the number of bytes to read from the server before terminating log output this may not display a complete final line of logging and may return slightly more or slightly less than the specified limit
in query
required false
schema
type str
sum get log stream
desc retrieve a stream of logs generated by a workload instances containers logs are generated by the containers and are not modified by stackpath log contents vary by the application running in the container though many containerized applications are configured to log to stdout and stderr
responses
200
desc streaming responses
v1logchunk
type obj
bytes
type str
format byte
desc raw log contents
desc a chunk of raw log data
title: 11_Instance Logs_GetLogs_63.json
